NAME
  stenokeys - sets up keys for stenographer client/server auth

SYNOPSIS
  stenokeys <stenouser> <stenogroup>

DESCRIPTION
  The stenokeys tool creates the required server and client certificates and
  keys for authentication of the stenographer client components when
  communicating with the server.

OPTIONS
  stenokeys accepts the username and group of the stenographer user to set the
  appropriate permissions on the created files.
